original_text:
But you have planted wickedness,
    you have reaped evil,
    you have eaten the fruit of deception.
Because you have depended on your own strength
    and on your many warriors,
korean_text: 너희는 악을 밭 갈아 죄를 거두고 거짓 열매를 먹었나니 이는 네가 네 길과 네 용사의 많음을 의뢰하였음이라

sentences.original_text: you have eaten the fruit of deception.
Because you have depended on your own strength

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신의 많은 전사들을 의지했기 때문입니다.
